title: Bryant Compressed
content:
Part of: **[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016032601/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016032601/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Rounded Typefaces**

Current URL:  
 [http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryantcom/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016032601/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryantcom/index.html "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryantcom/index.html")

Bryant [Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016032601/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Compressed)  
Designed by [Eric Olson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016032601/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eric%20Olson) 2002–2005

Designed for situations where large point sizes and maximum letter count need to coexist, Bryant [Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016032601/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Compressed) is the narrowest of the Bryant families. Sharp stem joins and increased contrast — stylistic departures from the other weights and widths — allow this face to keep the Bryant style while maintaining a narrow width.
author: AndrewSipe
